Storage Instructions: - Store the Trento Chocolate in a cool, dry place, ideally between 65 - 68°F. - Avoid exposure to heat and direct sunlight, as this could cause the chocolate to melt or discolor. - Once the package is opened, ensure to wrap the remaining chocolate tightly or store in an airtight container to maintain flavor and texture. - Do not store chocolate in the fridge, as it can lead to condensation, which will affect its texture and flavor. Ingredients: - Premium quality cocoa beans - Cream - Sugar - Vanilla extract - Lecithin (an emulsifier) - Natural and artificial flavors

While Tiffany is the umbrella brand, we have several sub brands catering to different target groups with major power brands being Chunko’s, Nutty Bites, Delights range, Cookie Monsta, Oatsville, Marie & Digestive. Our current positioning in the market is affordable, top quality biscuits, with something for everyone in the family. The brand is well recognized across nationalities and age groups. Our current positioning in the market is affordable, top quality biscuits, with something for everyone in the family. Product Description: Revel in the exotic flavors of the Mediterranean with Zeta Co.'s Kamareddine Paste in a convenient 400g package. This exquisite paste is made from naturally sun-dried apricots, exuding rich flavors and a delightful sugary aroma. Suited for both beverages and desserts, it's a luxurious treat offering superior quality and authentic taste. Its thick, smooth texture guarantees a delicious and satisfying experience with every scoop. Whether you're preparing a traditional Middle Eastern recipe or crafting a unique culinary creation, Zeta Co.'s Kamareddine Paste brings an enticing depth of flavor to your table. How to Use: - Mix a desired amount of Kamareddine paste with water. A suggested ratio is 50g of paste for every 1 cup of water. - Stir the mixture until it reaches a smooth consistency. - Using this mixture, you can either prepare a refreshing Kamareddine drink or use it as a base for a variety of desserts such as puddings, pies, or tarts. - Adjust the amount of paste for a stronger or lighter flavor as desired. Storage Instructions: - After opening, ensure the Kamareddine paste is stored in an airtight container to maintain freshness. - Keep the container in a cool and dry place, away from direct sunlight. - For prolonged storage, it can be refrigerated. However, allow it to reach room temperature before use for optimal flavor. Ingredients: - Sun-dried Apricots - Granulated Sugar - Citric Acid - Water

Product Description: Treat yourself to the satisfying flavor of Wara Fresh Chicken Fillet. This 400g pack of chicken fillet is a combination of quality, health, and taste. Sourced from trusted farmers and handled with utmost care, each fillet is trimmed of excess fat and prepared under strict hygienic conditions, resulting in a lean, tender, and succulent piece of poultry. Perfect for grilling, roasting, pan-frying, or baking, these chicken fillets provide a healthy and versatile ingredient that fits seamlessly into your favorite recipes. How to Use: 1. Thaw the product in the refrigerator if frozen. 2. Rinse the chicken fillets under cold running water before cooking. 3. Pat the fillets dry using kitchen paper. 4. Season the fillets with your favorite spices or marinade, let it absorb the flavor for some time. 5. Depending on your recipe, grill, roast, pan-fry, or bake the chicken fillets. 6. Pierce the thickest part of the fillet with a skewer to make sure it's cooked: the juice that runs out should be clear, not pink. Storage Instructions: 1. If intended for use within two days, keep refrigerated at 0°C to 4°C. 2. For longer storage, freeze on day of purchase at -18°C or colder. 3. Do not re-freeze once thawed. Ingredients: - 100% Fresh Chicken Fillet.

Product Description: Dive into a fine dining experience right at the comfort of your home with the Wara Frozen Quails, a pack of 6. These are premium, high-quality quails that have been expertly cleaned and frozen promptly to lock in the natural flavors and tenderness. Whether you desire gourmet quail dishes or simple grilled quails, these versatile birds will deliver a succulent end result every time. How to Use: 1. Thaw the Wara Frozen Quails completely before cooking. You can do this by placing them in the refrigerator for approximately 24 hours. 2. Pat them dry to remove any excess water. 3. Season as per your recipe or preference. 4. You can roast, grill, or poach the quails according to your dish requirements. 5. Ensure to cook the quails thoroughly till the meat is no longer pink, for a safe and delicious meal. Storage Instructions: 1. Store the Wara Frozen Quails in the freezer until you are ready to cook them. 2. After thawing, if you don't plan on cooking them immediately, store in the refrigerator and consume within 24 hours. 3. Do not refreeze the quails once thawed. Ingredients: - Premium Quality Quails.
